text:
I'm trying to skip GPU CI on buildkite with PR labels. I'm trying

```if: |
  !(
      build.pull_request.labels includes "no cuda" ||
      build.pull_request.labels includes "no gpu"
  )```
But this doesn't work. Does anyone make similar thing work? Is `if: build.message !~ /\[skip tests\]/` more reliable?

<https://github.com/JuliaFolds/FoldsKernelAbstractions.jl/pull/5>
